concept.title: MQTT Client Monitoring
concept.shortdesc: View live MQTT client data, search for and delete unconnected MQTT clients.

conbody.p: You can use the MQTT client monitor to delete inactive MQTT clients. You can view metrics on the following information for MQTT clients that are disconnected, durable subscribers:

dlentry.dd: The client ID is the identifier that is associated with an MQTT client.
The most recent date that the specified client ID connected to .

conbody.p: If a client is not connected to for a significant time, then you might want to consider deleting that client. For example, consider deleting a client if a device is lost, or damaged. When you delete a client, you also delete any durable subscriptions (and associated buffered messages) created by that client. Alternatively, there might be an error that is preventing that client ID from connecting.
